about_the_game:
Do you wanna walk the streets of Barcelona while looking for cute kitties? You’ve come to the right place!

Catcelona: a purrfect city, offers the possibility to do both. Barcelona is the scenery of this hidden object story, where you need to find all 300 cats and guide them to their safe place, their shelter.

All our cats are real-life cats, and they have their own lives, likes, and dislikes. We love that about them! It didn’t make sense to just put cats, have you noticed how different they can be and how many amazing stories they hide?

If you want your cat to be IN the game you can do it through this link:

If you're a shelter or any other cat helping facility, you can write to us at visitcatcelona@gmail.com and we'll be very glad to help you!

Barcelona offers tons of amazing places, some of them sure you have already heard about, but others we hope will surprise you.

Playing this game, you’ll be able to play out and in well-known spaces like Sagrada Familia or Parc Güell (yes, we love Gaudí!), but you’ll also get to discover some hidden gems like Poblenou’s graveyard or Catalonia's library.

And what about sound? Oh, sound is so amazing and powerful!

We’ve teamed up with Dash Obradors and got some help from one of our most admired sound makers (name to come!) to create a perfect environment for you to play, have fun but not stress at all.

Barcelona has its own sounds, and we wanted to respect that inside the buildings, so go step in and discover everything!

Cats don’t differentiate. Sure, they judge, but they love with no exceptions.

We needed to respect that, and we’ve created an additional mode for neurodivergent people, and we’ve been formed and helped by accessibility experts so we don’t leave anyone out.

That’s also why you can get the game in tons of different languages, meowing is universal, and so are we!
detailed_description:
Do you wanna walk the streets of Barcelona while looking for cute kitties? You’ve come to the right place!

Catcelona: a purrfect city, offers the possibility to do both. Barcelona is the scenery of this hidden object story, where you need to find all 300 cats and guide them to their safe place, their shelter.

All our cats are real-life cats, and they have their own lives, likes, and dislikes. We love that about them! It didn’t make sense to just put cats, have you noticed how different they can be and how many amazing stories they hide?

If you want your cat to be IN the game you can do it through this link:

If you're a shelter or any other cat helping facility, you can write to us at visitcatcelona@gmail.com and we'll be very glad to help you!

Barcelona offers tons of amazing places, some of them sure you have already heard about, but others we hope will surprise you.

Playing this game, you’ll be able to play out and in well-known spaces like Sagrada Familia or Parc Güell (yes, we love Gaudí!), but you’ll also get to discover some hidden gems like Poblenou’s graveyard or Catalonia's library.

And what about sound? Oh, sound is so amazing and powerful!

We’ve teamed up with Dash Obradors and got some help from one of our most admired sound makers (name to come!) to create a perfect environment for you to play, have fun but not stress at all.

Barcelona has its own sounds, and we wanted to respect that inside the buildings, so go step in and discover everything!

Cats don’t differentiate. Sure, they judge, but they love with no exceptions.

We needed to respect that, and we’ve created an additional mode for neurodivergent people, and we’ve been formed and helped by accessibility experts so we don’t leave anyone out.

That’s also why you can get the game in tons of different languages, meowing is universal, and so are we!
name: Catcelona

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 11.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: A nice, cozy and entertaining video game that mixes Barcelona's architecture and hidden cats. Find them all!
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Catalan*
*languages with full audio support
